def_en: If you suffer from tunnel vision, you are unable to see things that are not straight in front of you.

def_cn: 一孔之见;狭隘的眼光;井蛙之见
def_en: If you say that someone has tunnel vision, you disapprove of them because they are concentrating completely on achieving a particular aim, and do not notice or consider all the different aspects of what they are doing.
